Plot: Shortly after failing to rescue a drowning man, Donato meets Konrad, a friend of the victim. They soon begin a relationship which seems doomed from the start, while Donato's past catches up with him.
Title: Futuro Beach
Writer: Felipe Bragança, Karim Aïnouz, Marco Dutra (contributing writer)
Actors: Wagner Moura, Clemens Schick, Jesuíta Barbosa, Fred Lima
